title: Ford 4.6L SOHC (2V) & 3.8L OHV Engine Service Manual
description:
This is the engine chapter from the 1997 Mercury Cougar OEM service manual by Helms Inc. 
The available engines covered in this chapter is the Essex V6 3.8L OHV and the first production 4.6L V8 OHC (2V.) 
Helms is the OEM service manual for most automotive manufacturers and is the real deal. 
If you like what you see, please help seed because without you guys, all my hard work will be for nothing! 
Seed seed seed!

Helm only sells manuals written by the manufacturer (Original OEM), 
designed specifically for your vehicle or equipment.
Original OEM Manuals are more accurate and complete than any other service information available.
These are the same manuals your dealer service center uses so you know you're getting the 
technical information needed to service and maintain your vehicle or equipment.
Many OEM Manuals include diagramed repair and replacement procedures, electrical diagrams and training information
